isVirginiaEmployees.ui:description: New businesses that have paid or will pay wages to employees working in Virginia and meet certain employer qualifications are required to register with the Virginia Employment Commission.

isFictitiousName.ui:description: Are you planning on doing business under a Fictitious Name?  If so, registration with the State Corporation Commission is required for any business that does not use its legal, registered name as part of its business name.
